name: Samurai Samurai Revolution
description:
===============================================================
Samurai Samurai Revolution ! Is an arcade game made in 60 hours for Video Games Lab 2, organized by At0mium ! 

ATTENTION : Between phases, you have to wait a bit while it's loading, but the game isn't broken. We're sorry about that, time is unforgiving.

CONTROLS : Up/Down arrows to move , Spacebar to attack

Made by : Ranuki's Campfire Studio

Lore : A dragon samurai is searching for the ultimate ware musical weapon. And he found it ! He wants to hack it and make it his...but the weapon can protect itself through music and rhythm...
Will the samurai vanquish ?    ===============================================================  

Credits : Thomas Lecrivain - Game Design
Florian Ortega -  Animation Art
Milia Barrière - Animation Art
Junie Poli-Tessier - UI Design
Sasha Joffard - Sound Design
Yohann Degli Esposti - Game Development

===============================================================

Install instructions

You can play in browser !
